title: Why is there not a LoL Boards App
body: It would provide easy access to the Lrague boards. It would make my life easier :D

replies.body: Support for mobile is currently on our list of things to tackle, as for a mobile app that is a bit trickier though definitely something we'd like to consider.
Who knows. As long as it isn't as long as {{champion:25}} stuns I'll be happy :P
I am a Morgana main and I work on the Boards. Hmm.
it's fine as long as your coworkers aren't leona and annie mains.

> [{quoted}](name=Enraged Piglet,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=Q8PPbiPK,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-01-16T23:21:54.734+0000)
>
> it's fine as long as your coworkers aren't leona and annie mains.

As we speak..

Just FYI, you can edit your posts ;)
Oh good. It has finally made it to a freaking list.
True doe. I need one so bad. It's just boring classes after classes....
Assuming by drinking which brings out the fake personalities in all of us is so much fun. And it's an 8am class, what am I suppose to do to "get a life" in the morning?
